loans.name: Maria Nohemy Banegas

texts.es:
La señora María de 50 años de edad, es casada asiste junto con su familia a la iglesia, tiene un hijos que estudia y depende de ella, su esposo le apoya económicamente, vive en la ciudad de San Lorenzo.
Doña María se dedica desde hace ya varios años al negocio de pulpería pues ahí ella atiende a sus clientes con los productos como verduras, granos básicos, refrescos, jugos y artículos de limpieza. Doña María esta solicitando 20,000.00 lempiras para abastecer su negocio, ya que desea comprar sandalias de verano ya que se acerca la época de semana santa, con las ganancias pretende mejorar sus condiciones de vida ya que su negocio mejorara con este préstamo porque tendrá mas productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.
Doña María sueña que sus hijos sean independientes y que tengan su propio negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2012
texts.en:
María is 50 years old and lives in the city of San Lorenzo. She is married, and attends church with her family. She has a son who goes to school and depends on her. Her husband supports her financially.

María has had a small general store business for several years now. There she serves her customers with products such as vegetables, staple grains, soft drinks, juices and cleaning items.

María is applying for 20,000 lempiras in order to stock her business, as she wishes to buy summer sandals, since the Holy Week season is approaching. 

With her earnings, she intends to improve her living conditions, as her business will improve with this loan, because she will have more products to sell to her customers.

María dreams of her children being independent and having their own businesses.

loans.use: To buy eggs, meats, cold cuts, vegetables, staple grains and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Yuli

texts.es:
Yuli, es una mujer joven de 20 años; vive en la casa de sus padres junto a su pareja Elmer de 24 años y su pequeña hija Ariana de 01 año. Yuli, desde muy pequeña tiene el conocimiento de cómo cultivar las plantas que se produce por esta zona; es por eso que se dedico a cultivar plantas de cacao y coca en los terrenos que sus padres le heredaron; ahora junto a su pareja se dedican a ver el cuidado y la producción de sus siembras. En los tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes le apoyan en la extracción de su cosecha; esta labor viene realizando hace 03 años en su propio terreno. 
Su mayor anhelo es poder terminar la construcción de su casa donde puedan vivir tranquilos y brindarle un buen futuro a su pequeña hija. Este es su crédito número 01 con MFP; se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago porque siendo así podrá acceder a otro. Asimismo agradece a su banco comunal por permitirles ser una socia más en el grupo. Con el préstamo acreditado más las ganancias de su trabajo podrá terminar la construcción de su hogar.
texts.en:
Yuli is a young woman of 20.  She lives in her parents' house together with her partner Elmer, 24, and her little daughter Ariana, 1.  Since she was very young, Yuli knew how to cultivate the plants that grow in her region.  Because of this she works cultivating cacao and coca on the land that her parents gave her.  Now, together with her partner, she works at the care and production of her plantings.  At harvest time she has the help of day laborers who help in the extraction of the harvest.  She has been doing this work on her own land for three years.

Her greatest wish is to be able to finish building her house where they can live peacefully and to give a good future to her little girl.  

This is her first loan from MFP.  She promises to be punctual in her payments because in this way she will be able to get another loan.  She also thanks her communal bank for letting her be a member of the group.  With this loan and the income from her work she will be able to finish the construction of her home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish building her house.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Teodoro, tiene 23 años es un joven responsable dedicado al cuidado de su producción; vive en cuarto alquilado, y con grandes deseos de salir adelante. Teodoro, es un hombre de provecho, su labor principal es el cuidado de sus plantas de cacao, esta labor lleva realizando hace 08 años y comenta que si no estaría al pendiente de su siembra las plagas lo aquejarían, sobre todo las malezas que día a día crecen. En los tiempos de cosecha siempre cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros para que le ayuden a cosechar rápido los frutos; después de todo, lo lleva a vender a las sociedades acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo. Con el tiempo su mayor anhelo es tener su propia casa. Es por ello que ahora prioriza en realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos para que siempre estén fértiles. Este es su crédito número 01 con MFP, se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Asimismo agradece a su banco comunal por permitirles ser parte de ello. Con el préstamo solicitado comprará agroquímicos para fertilizar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 23 year old and is a responsible young man dedicated to caring for his crops; he lives in a rented room and is eager to get ahead. Teodoro is an honest man whose main job is that of caring for his cacao plants which he has been doing for 8 years. He says that if he wasn't around to tend to his crop, pests would attack it, especially as the weeds are growing every day.  

During the harvest period, Teodoro always relies on the help of labourers to help him to pick the fruit quickly, after which, he transports the fruit to sell to intermediary companies who pay him well for each kilogram. 

His biggest desire is to have his own house over time. It is for that reason, that he now prioritizes maintaining his crops so that they continue to be fertile. 

This is his first loan with MFP and he is committed to making his payments on time. He is also grateful to his communal bank for allowing him to participate in this. With the loan he is seeking, he will buy agrochemicals to fertilize his crops.

loans.use: to buy agrochemicals.

loans.name: Zocima

texts.es:
Zocima, de 40 años de edad, es una mujer muy empeñosa; vive en su propia casa junto a sus cuatro hijos; quienes son el motivo de sus esfuerzos. Zocima, se dedica al cuidado de sus siembras de cacao; comenta que empezó a labrar la tierra con la ayuda de algunos jornaleros; luego cultivar plantas de caco y coca. Esta labor le lo realiza hace más de 12 años y ahora solo ve la producción de sus plantas ya que ella y sus hijos dependen de su  obtención. Para ella es muy  fácil tener que fumigar y abonar sus cultivos pero; a veces lo hace con mucho temor ya que puede ser ingerida el veneno mediante la piel de su cuerpo; pero aun así ella no deja sus plantas. Con el crédito solicitado podrá terminar la fachada de su casa ya que falta sólo el acabo. Este es su préstamo número 06 con MFP; se siente contenta por seguir contando con el apoyo financiero; así como también agradece a su banco comunal por trabajar con socios solidarios y responsables 
Con los 2.000 nuevos soles; comprará cemento y otros materiales para la culminación de su hogar.
texts.en:
Zocima, age 40, is a very hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her four children, and they are the motivation for her efforts.  

Zocima devotes herself to taking care of her cacao plants.  She says that she started to work the land with the help of some day workers.  Then, she cultivated cacao and coconut plants.  She has been doing this work for over 12 years.  Now she only looks towards the production of her plants because she and her children depend upon it.

It is very easy for her to fumigate and fertilize her crops.  At times she is very fearful that she could be ingesting the poison into her body through her skin.  Even so, she does not leave her plants.

With the requested loan she will be able to finish the façade of her house because it only needs the finishing.  This is her sixth loan with MFP.  She is happy to continue counting on the financial support.  She is also grateful to her communal bank for working with supportive and responsible members.  She will use the 2,000 soles to buy cement and other materials to finish her home.

loans.use: to buy cement and other materials to finish building her house.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana, de 24 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, así como alegre y amable. Es conviviente con Oscar quien es comerciante y padre de su hija Melisa de 1 año de nacida.  Vive en compañía de su pareja e  hija, instalados cómodamente en una casa alquilada. El negocio que tiene Roxana es la venta de ropa y sabanas, productos que trae desde la ciudad de Lima, ya sea para damas, caballeros y niños, asimismo almohadas y sabanas, para eso realiza viajes periódicos a la capital buscando los mejores modelos actuales para que sean vendidos con rápidez. Gracias a éste negocio, se hizo conocida logrando captar mayor clientela durante esto 3 años de trabajo, siendo su pareja quien la motivo a incursionar en éste negocio. Lo considera rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja, permitiéndole viajar diferentes ciudades y conocer nuevos lugares. Por otro lado le gusta tener un oficio, y tener ingresos para pagar sus gastos personales y de su hogar; sin embargo lo que le incomoda es que algunos de sus clientes se demoran en el pago de sus créditos. Su plan es adquirir su propia casa, donde desea establecerse y abrir una bodega de abarrotes. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de mercadería para  su negocio como almohadas y sabanas al por mayor, buscando precios más bajos para tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Roxana is 24 and is a hard-working and enterprising woman.  She is also happy and friendly.  She is in a common-law marriage with Oscar, who is a merchant and the father of their daughter, Melisa, who is 1.  She lives comfortably with Oscar and Melisa in a rented house.  She has a business selling clothing and sheets, which she buys in the city of Lima.  The clothing is for women, men, and children.  She also sells pillows and sheets, for which she makes periodic trips to the capital looking for the best current styles so they will sell quickly.  Thanks to this business, she has made a name for herself and has captured a larger clientele during her 3 years of work.  Oscar was the one who motivated her to start this business.  She thinks it is profitable and lets her travel to different cities and get to know new places.  She likes to have a business and to have income to pay for her personal and home expenses.  Nevertheless, what makes her uncomfortable is when some customers are late making their credit payments.  Her plan is to acquire her own home, where she can establish herself and open a grocer store.  This will be her fourth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma.  She hopes that through it, she can continue with her objectives.  She also promises to make her payments on time, like she has with her previous loans.  With the requested amount of 1,000 PEN, she will invest in the wholesale purchase of merchandise for her business like pillows and sheets.  She will look for low prices so she can make larger profits.

loans.use: to buy more pillows and sheets.

loans.name: Wariti Group

texts.fr: La cliente Zaina, membre du groupe de crédit  Wariti. Veuve, femme  dynamique, ambitieuse, entrepreneur autodidacte, âgée de 48 ans, mère de 7 enfants. Elle est  vendeuse des poissons. Son mari fut décédé inopinément d’une courte maladie. Elle a commencé son business avec  un micro crédit de 50$ reçu de l’IMF Hekima. Les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et d’appui à la scolarité de ses  enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  7eme  crédit. Au cours de la période, cette cliente a vu ses affaires prospèrent positivement. Ainsi elle a  décidé d’augmenter son montant de crédit pour ce nouveau cycle. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  3 paniers de poissons (sales, fumés ou frais).  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et acheter une maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
Zaina is a member of the WARITI group.  She is a dynamic and ambitious widow.  She is 48 years old, the mother of 7 children and has taught herself how to become an entrepreneur.  She sells fish.  Her husband passed away unexpectedly after a brief illness.  

She started her business after receiving a micro-loan of 50 USD from the micro-finance institution Hekima.  With the profits from her business, she is able to put some money into savings, feed her children and pay for their school fees. She has now received her seventh loan.  During that period of time, she has seen her business thrive.  This is why she has decided to request a larger loan amount for this new cycle.  With this new loan, she will be able to purchase three baskets of fish (salted, smoked or fresh). 

She would also like to see her children grow, and to buy a house.  She thanks Hekima for its action in favor of the empowerment of poor women excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy three baskets of fish (salted, smoked or fresh).

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Lydie Nonvignon

texts.fr: Lydie Nonvignon âgée de 34 ans est mariée et mère de  trois enfants. Elle dispose d'une boutique dans laquelle elle vend des vivres et du charbon. Elle a bénéficié d'un financement auprès de Finadev en vue d'acquérir une grande part de marché ce qui lui permettra de faire continuer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Lydie Nonvignon is 34 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  

She has a store in which she sells food products and charcoal.  She has received a loan from Finadev, which will help her to increase her market share and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy one bag of maize, one bag of gari (food made from cassava tubers), and ten bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, es una mujer de lucro, tiene 36 años de edad y es una mujer que ve por el bienestar de su esposo Máximo de 36 años u sus dos hijos Antony de 10 años y Jack de 08 años. La señora Luz María, se dedica al trabajo del campo cuya labor es labrar la tierra para cultivar plantas de cacao y coca. Esta labor empezó desde muy pequeña pero lleva 09 años laborando en su propia chacra. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de peones  quienes tienen mucha experiencia en la colecta de sus frutos; ella después de elaborar  su cosecha pues ejecuta el secado de los granos de cacao o coca (depende a la temporada de cosecha que realice).
Luz María lo lleva a vender estas cosechas a los centros de acopio de su localidad porque son asociaciones que pagan muy bien por cada kilo. Por otra parte la única dificultad es cuando bajan los precios del cacao y la coca porque así no logra alcanzarle para los gastos de su familia. 
Con el préstamo solicitado realizara el mantenimiento de sus plantas para que en las siguientes cosechas obtenga buenos resultados. Este es su crédito número 06 con MFP y sabe que tiene que ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago, así podrá acceder a otro préstamo. Asimismo es una socia muy responsable y activa. 
Con el crédito obtenido comprará abono y otros funguicidas para mantener fértiles a su producción.
texts.en:
Luz is a businesswoman. She is 36 and she is a woman who looks out for the well-being of her husband Máximo, 36, and her two sons Antony, 10, and Jack, 8. Luz María does field work, which is to work the land in order to grow cacao and coca plants. She began this work when she was very young, but she has been working on her own farm for 9 years. At harvest times she relies on the help of day laborers who have a lot of experience in harvesting her crops. After bringing in her harvest, she dries the cacao beans or the coca (depending on the harvest season). 

Luz María brings these harvests to sell at the distribution centers in her town because they are associations that pay very well for every kilo. On the other hand, the only difficulty is when cacao and coca prices fall, because that way she does not manage to cover the family's expenses.

With the loan requested, she will maintain her plants so that in the coming harvests she will have good results. This is her sixth loan with MFP, and she knows that she needs to be punctual with her loan repayments, so she can have another loan. She is also a very responsible and active member.

With the loan, she will buy fertilizer and other fungicides to keep her crops fertile.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides

loans.name: Wilfredo Martinez Villalobos

texts.es:
Don Wilfredo, esta casado, tiene 38 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos y vive con su esposa en su propia casa de habitación junto con sus hijos en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Don Wilfredo es la venta de frutas y verduras como melón, sandia, naranjas, papas, tomates, repollo, yuca, banano verde, zanahoria, pataste, piña y leña, en diferentes Barrios y colonias de la zona sur de Honduras.
Don Wilfredo esta solicitando la cantidad de 15,000.00 lempiras para la compra de frutas y verduras para su negocio, y de esta manera generar mayores ventas en su negocio, asi sus ingresos serán mejores.
Don Wilfredo entre sus sueños a futuro esta la idea de terminar su casa ya que no esta terminada por asuntos económicos, pero con el apoyo de este tipo de créditos el y su familia tendrá un mejor estilo de vida.




San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo 2012
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 38 years old, and married. He lives with his wife and their two children, in their own home in Valle department in southern Honduras. 

Wilfredo has a business selling fruits and vegetables, such as melons, watermelons, oranges, potatoes, tomatoes, cabbage, yuca, green bananas, carrots, pear squash, pineapple and firewood, in various neighborhoods and districts in southern Honduras.

Don Wilfredo is applying for a loan in the amount of 15,000 lempiras to buy fruits and vegetables for his business, and in this way generate greater sales in his business, so his income will be better.

Wilfredo's dreams for the future include the idea of completing his house, as it is unfinished because of financial issues. With the support of these types of loans, he and his family will have better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy cabbages, potatoes, yuca, green bananas, melons, watermelons, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is a humble person with a strong personality. He lives with his spouse and children in the village of Villa concepcion.

Rolando is engaged in a hog-raising business that primarily involves hogs for breeding. It is a business he started eight years ago. The best way to earn profits is to go to the livestock markets to buy and sell pigs. Now, he needs to increase his business, and this is why he is taking out a loan of 5,000 PHP that he will use to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise. This business helps Rolando, because it's the only source of income he has to raise his family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise.

loans.name: Fuente De Vida 1 Group

texts.es:
La señora Alejandra es casada, tiene 37 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 7 hijos de los cuales estudian 4, se dedica al comercio a la atención a tienda en general, y a la crianza de animales domésticos, lleva 8 años con la tienda que tiene, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio también.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la la compra de aguas gaseosas, jugos, galletas, avena en bolsa, condimentos, etc. Como también para la compra de gallinas y cerdos para crianza. Ya que espera ver su tienda mas grande y surtido. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la crianza de animales y a la atención de tienda en general.
texts.en:
Alejandra, 37, is married and has 7 children, 4 that are in school. She herself went through 6 years of primary school.  She has been a merchant with a general store for 8 years and she also raises domestic animals.  Her husband helps her with the business as well.

She has organized a group to request a loan for buying mineral water, juices, cookies, bags of oatmeal, condiments, etc, as well as chickens and pigs to raise.  She is hoping to see her store expand and  be well-stocked.  The other members of the group also raise animals and work in stores.

loans.use: to buy products for the store and chickens and pigs

loans.name: Shahida's Group

texts.en:
Shahida has applied for a loan from KIVA's partner, Asasah, for her beauty salon. With the loan, she will buy beauty products such as shampoo, lotions, creams and make-up like mascara, eye shadow and nail polish, etc., in larger quantities. She will also buy better quality products that will enable her to offer better services to her clients and earn more income. 
She loves her work and her clients are very satisfied with her quality of work. 
Her husband runs an office in the market. He offers calling services to his clients and sells calling cards.  
Shahida is the mother of three children. Her youngest daughter is only three years old while the others are studying in a nearby school. She is a great mother and housewife, and manages the finances of her home very well. 
She is confident about her business success as a result of loan investment.

loans.use: To buy beauty products for beauty salon.

loans.name: Elderson Albano

texts.en: Elderson is 36 years old and married. He has three children. He buys and sells pigs. Elderson has been in this business for a year and is successful. He started the business with three piglets and gradually expanded the business. He wants to receive a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to buy feed and vitamins for his pigs. He thanks everyone in advance for your support and help.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for his pigs.

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar is the mother of a son and two daughters. Her son is 20 years old and runs a grocery store in the market while her daughters are students. 
Kosar is an embroidery expert. She embroiders clothes to meet her clients' demands. She is very skillful in her work and receives regular orders every month. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner, Asasah, to expand her embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy embroidery stock such as beads, embroidery threads and frames in larger quantities that will allow her to get larger orders and increase her profits by fulfilling them on time. 
She is very experienced in her work and confident about her business success as a result of this loan investment.

loans.use: To buy embroidery stock.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Con las ganas de salir adelante que siempre la han caracterizado, Maria se ha esforzado en su trabajo diariamente para poder ofrecer en su hogar mayores oportunidades económicas que se transmitan en una mejor calidad de vida. Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer un buen hogar, y es por esto que debido a los bajos ingresos de su esposo decidió montar un negocio con el cual pudiera aportar económicamente al sostenimiento de su hogar. Fue así como Maria montó su negocio de preparación y venta de comidas donde ofrece toda clase de fritos, bebidas, entre otros, y gracias a esto ha podido mejorar la calidad de vida de todo su hogar. Con la buena calidad de sus productos ha podido captar un gran número de clientes, lo que le ha permitido a su negocio crecer cada vez más y ofrecer cada vez un mejor servicio. Con el ánimo de comprar insumos que requiere para su negocio, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de empaques e insumos que requiere para su negocio.

Maria espera seguir entregando los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes sin ningún contratiempo y poder seguir aumentando sus ingresos para su hogar. Además, Maria sueña con poder ofrecer en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y ofrecer a sus hijos mayores oportunidades económicas que les permita progresar más fácilmente.
texts.en:
With the desire to get ahead that has always characterized her, Maria has put forth great effort in her daily work in order to provide her household with greater financial opportunities.  These will transmit into a better quality of life.

Maria is married and has three children.  She has always wanted to provide them with a good home.  It is for that reason, and due to her husband’s low income, that she decided to establish a business.  She did this so that she would be able to contribute financially to the support of her household.

That is how Maria started her business of preparing and selling food.  She offers all types of fried food and drinks, among others.  Thanks to this she has been able to improve the quality of life for her entire household.  With the good quality of her products she has been able to get a large number of customers.  This has allowed her business to grow more and to offer better service.

With the intention of buying supplies that she needs for her business, Maria is looking for a loan to buy packaging and supplies that she needs for her business.  Maria hopes to continue delivering orders from her customers without any setbacks.  She also hopes to be able to continue increasing her income for her household.

Maria dreams of being able to offer her household a better quality of life.  She also dreams of offering her children greater financial opportunities, which will allow them to progress more easily.

loans.use: to buy packaging and supplies that she needs for her business.

loans.name: 03-1-60-Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Hiên has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase cloth to do tailoring service. Hiên has been involved in this business for 4 years.

Hiên is 25 years old and she is married with 1 children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 1 dependent.

Hiên is the group leader of the 03-1-60-Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2010, Hiên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hiên has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main harship that Hiên faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hiên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to do tailoring clothes service.

loans.name: 3.8. 146.thiệu Toán Group

texts.en:
Tuyết operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to maintain the small restaurant. Tuyết  has been involved in this business for 5 years.

Tuyết is 27-years-old and she is married with one child. She is the group leader of the 3.8. 146.Thiệu Toán solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2009, Tuyết  joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tuyết  has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tuyết  hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase materials to maintain her small restaurant.

loans.name: Maximo Flores

texts.es:
El señor Máximo  de 38 años de edad, es casado, con tres hijos que dependen de el, su esposa le ayuda a vender el producto en su casa y una de sus hijas le ayuda con los quehaceres del hogar, el vive en San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Máximo se dedica a la venta de pan y tajaditas de plátano y mínimo en su motocicleta desde hace 4 años, el compra en la panadería donde el trabaja por la mañana y por la tarde a partir de las dos de la tarde sale en su motocicleta a vender el pan en los barrios y colonias de san Lorenzo.
El préstamo se utilizara en la compra de pan y tajaditas de plátano para vender en las pulperías y lugares donde el deja todo los días la venta diaria.
Este préstamo impactara en la vida de Máximo ya que desea con las ganancias que le genere el negocio comprarse un solar para construir su casa.
El sueño de Máximo es tener su propia casa para así dejarles patrimonio a sus hijos.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2012
texts.en:
Máximo, 38, is married with three dependent children.  His wife helps him to sell the product in their home, and one of their daughters helps with the household chores.  He lives in San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras.

Máximo has worked for four years selling bread, plantain chips, and bananas on his motorcycle.  He buys in the bakery where he works in the morning and, in the afternoon, after 2, he goes out on his motorcycle to sell the bread in the neighborhoods and housing developments of San Lorenzo.

He will use the loan to buy bread and plantain chips to sell in the local stores and places where he leaves everything for daily sale.

This loan will impact Máximo's life because with the profits the business generates for him he wants to buy a plot of land to build his house.  Máximo's dream is to have his own house to leave his children an inheritance.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, March 2012

loans.use: to buy bread and plantain chips for his business.

loans.name: Ana Maria Muñoz

texts.es:
Ana, sin contar con mucho capital pero manteniendo las ganas de salir adelante que siempre la han caracterizado, se vio en la obligación de encontrar una fuente de ingresos que le permitiera aportar económicamente al sostenimiento de su hogar, pues los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos del mismo. Ana se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 2 y 14 años de edad, quienes siempre han sido la motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Gracias a que una amiga le enseñó como trabajar el negocio, Ana decidió montar una venta de productos de uso personal desde su casa donde tiene una vitrina para exhibirlos y gracias a esto ha podido generar ingresos extras con los que su hogar ha podido tener una mejor calidad de vida. Por la buena atención que ofrece y la buena calidad de sus productos, Ana ha captado un gran número de clientes que le garantizan muy buenas ventas en su negocio, a tal punto que la necesidad de capital se vuelve una dificultad constante para poder responder a los grandes pedidos que hacen sus clientes. Con el ánimo de poder comprar mercancía para su negocio, Ana busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal con los cuales pueda responder a los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

Ana espera que con esta compra de la mercancía siga respondiendo a los pedidos que le hacen y pueda seguir aumentando su capital para que su negocio siga creciendo cada vez más. Además, Ana espera que con mayores ingresos sus hijos y su esposo puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y poder también cumplir su sueño de tener un gran almacén donde ofrecer sus productos y donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Ana, without much capital but maintaining the will to advance that has always characterized her, saw the need to find a source of income that would permit her to contribute economically to the support of her household, since her husband's income is not always sufficient to be able to meet all the household expenses. Ana is married and has two children, ages 2 and 14, who have always been the motivation for her hard work in her business. Thanks to a friend who taught her how to run the business, Ana decided to begin selling personal products from her home, where she has a display case to exhibit them. Thanks to her business, she has been able to generate extra income, with which her household has been able to have a better quality of life. Because of the good service that she offers and the good quality of her products, Ana has attracted a large number of customers, which guarantees her very good sales in her business, to the point that the need for capital has become a constant difficulty in being able to respond to the large orders that her customers place. With the intention of being able to buy merchandise for her business, Ana is seeking a loan that will offer her the possibility of purchasing personal products with which she can respond to the orders that her customers have placed.

Ana hopes that with this purchase of merchandise she can continue responding to her customers' orders and can continue increasing her capital so that her business can continue growing more and more. In addition, Ana hopes that with a larger income, her children and her husband can enjoy a better quality of life and that she can fulfill her dream of having a large store where she can offer her products and where she can generate jobs for the people who are most in need.

loans.use: to buy personal products with which she can respond to the orders that her customers have placed.

loans.name: Evaline Kimaleni

texts.en:
Evaline is 28 years old, married to Patrick, and a mother of three children aged nine, eight, and seven years respectively. She owns a retail shop, a business she ventured into three years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000. 

She has requested a loan of KES 15,000 to purchase more stock of sugar, bread, and a bale of wheat flour for sale. The profit she earns from this business would help her add more stock to her business as well as take care of her family. 

Her dream is to see her business expand to greater levels. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of sugar, bread, and a bale of wheat flour for sale

loans.name: Karine Arzumanyan

texts.en:
Karine is 42 years old. She lives in Burastan village with her pensioner parents. Karine works at the village school as a teacher. She also runs a farm where she grows peach trees and cultivates wheat. Karine's parents always help her with daily agricultural activities. She has been running the farm for 12 years. 
To start the new farming season, Karine needs necessary financial means. She has applied for this loan to purchase peach saplings and fertilizer. 
This loan will help Karine to expand the peach orchard, which means more harvest and a stable source of income for her family.

loans.use: to pay for peach saplings and fertilizer

loans.name: Carlos Nilbado Narvaez

texts.es:
Carlos con gran determinación un día decidió independizarse de su empleo y montar su propio negocio con el cual pudiese recibir mayores ingresos por el servicio prestado, pues en su empleo anterior sentía que su trabajo era muy mal remunerado. Carlos se encuentra casado y junto con su esposa han formado un gran hogar donde el aporta económicamente a través de su negocio de venta de comidas rápidas. El negocio lo aprendió a trabajar en su empleo anterior y desde entonces ha venido tomando cursos de manipulación de alimentos y otros con los que puede ofrecer a sus clientes cada vez un mejor servicio. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos y al buen servicio que ofrece, Carlos ha podido captar una gran cantidad de clientes y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenos niveles de ventas. Con el ánimo de seguir posicionando su negocio, seguirlo ampliando y ofrecer mayor capacidad de atención para sus clientes, Carlos busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de sillas y mesas para poder acomodar en su negocio y así tener mayor capacidad para atender a sus clientes.

Carlos espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo al ritmo que ha venido haciéndose, y así seguir generando ingresos con los cuales pueda aportar económicamente en su hogar. Además, Carlos espera que su negocio le brinde las oportunidades económicas que no tuvo desde niño y así pueda mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar. Carlos sueña con tener un gran local de comidas rápidas, donde pueda generar empleo para los más necesitados y de esta manera le mejore la calidad de vida a diferentes personas de su sector.
texts.en:
One day Carlos decided with great determination to become independent from his job and start his own business so he could receive more income for the service he offered.  In his previous job, he felt that he was very badly compensated.  Carlos is married, and together with his wife, they have formed a great home which he supports economically through his business of fast food sales.  He learned this business through his old job, and since then, he has been taking courses in food operations and others so he can offer his customers increasingly better service. Thanks to the good quality of his products and the good service he offers, Carlos has been able to attract a large number of customers, and this has let him have good levels of sales.  With the motivation of continuing to position his business, expanding it, and making it more attractive to his customers, Carlos is looking for a loan that will offer him the possibility of buying tables and chairs to be able to fix up his business and have a larger capacity to serve his customers.

Carlos hopes that in this way, his business will keep growing with the rhythm that it has been and that he will keep generating income with which he supports his home economically.  He also hopes that his business will offer him the economic opportunities that he hasn't had since he was a child so he can improve his home's quality of life.  Carlos dreams about having a big fast food location where he can generate jobs for people that need them most and in this way improve the quality of life of various people in his area.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs to be able to fix up his business and have more capacity to serve his customers.

loans.name: Jaycel

texts.en:
Jaycel is 22 years old, has one child and is married. Her spouse works abroad. She operates a small store to add to her spouse's income. She has been selling grocery items for over three years now. She would like to borrow additional funds in the amount of P5,000 to buy noodles, bread, eggs, and biscuits to sell in her store and increase her merchandise.

In the future, she would like to keep growing as a successful entrepreneur for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy noodles, bread, eggs, and biscuits to sell in her store

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela, de 49 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de servicial y amable. Es conviviente con Jesús quien es empleado y padre de sus 3 hijos pero el mayor ya es independiente y no vive con ella. Vive en compañía de su pareja y 2 de sus hijos Mary de 25 y Jesús de 14 años de edad, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. El negocio que tiene Estela es la venta de bebidas gasificadas, para eso cuenta con una refrigeradora la cual comprò con ayuda de su pareja y la instalaron en su casa, donde atienden a sus clientes. Continuó a lo largo de más de 1 año que viene funcionando su negocio. Viendo que faltaba en la economía  del hogar se inició por la idea de su pareja quien le aconsejo que pusiera éste negocio, y observando que tiene demanda por el clima caluroso de la zona, decidió continuar
 Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar, así como también le permite estar en casa para cuidar y atender a sus hijos a los quiere mucho y desea sacarlos adelante, siendo su motivación para seguir esforzándose. Su plan ahora es ampliar su negocio y abrir un restaurante en su casa ya que su pareja sabe de cocina y ha visto que es una buena zona para esta venta. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por tanto se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores, de esa manera tener acceso a otros créditos en el futuro.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá para ampliar su negocio, comprando más bebidas gasificadas al por mayor a menos precios para así tener mayor margen de ganancias.
texts.en:
Estela is 49 and is a hard-working, helpful, and friendly woman.  She is in a common-law marriage with Jesús, who works for a company and is the father of their 3 children.  The oldest is already independent and doesn't live with her.  She lives with Jesús and their 2 youngest children:  Mary, 25, and Jesús, 14.  They live comfortably in their own home.  Estela has a business selling soft drinks.  She has a refrigerator that she bought with Jesús' help, and they put it in their home, where she attends to her customers.  She has run this business for more than 1 year.  Seeing that their home was lacking financially, she started the business because of Jesús' idea.  He advised her to start it, observing that it was in demand because of the hot climate in the area.  She decided to continue with it.

She likes her business because it lets her have an economic income to support Jesús with their home's expenses.  It also lets her be at home so she can care for and attend to her children, whom she loves very much and of whom she wants to take good care.  They are her motivation to keep working hard.  Her plan now is to expand her business and open a restaurant in her home since Jesús knows how to cook, and she thinks it is a good area for this type of business.  This will be her fourth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma.  She hopes that through it, she will be able to continue with her goals.  She promises to make all of her payments on time like she has with her previous loans.  In this way, she will have access to more loans in the future.  With the requested amount of 2,000 PEN, she will invest in expanding her business, buying more soft drinks wholesale at lower prices so she can make better profits.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks.

loans.name: Ryan

texts.en: Ryan is 32 and single. He lives with his parents at Palayag. In order to help provide sustenance for his younger brothers, he raises hogs to fatten and sell them to butchers. In this business, he earns P3,000 per hog sale. As of now, he has an insufficient funds to buy hog feeds and vitamins to sustain his hogs. In this matter, he is asking for P5,000. Someday, he hopes to make his business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy hog feeds and vitamins to sustain his hogs.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
Salome is in the direct selling business while her spouse is farming rice as source of income. They work hard to provide sustenance for their family. 

She is now asking for a loan of P3,000 to buy more AVON products to sell such as cosmetics, perfumes, and lotions.

With continuous income from the business, she will make improvements to it and someday put up a small stall to conveniently stock up her products.

loans.use: to buy more AVON products to sell such as cosmetics, perfumes, and lotions

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
Benito, de 31 años de edad, es un hombre con mucha experiencia en los negocios, además de ser alegre y amable. Es conviviente con Elsa quien es comerciante y madre de sus 2 hijos Jorge de 2 años y Sayaza de 6 meses de nacida. Vive en compañía de su pareja y sus hijos a quienes quiere  mucho y son su motivación, habitando en su casa propia. Las actividades que realiza Benito es la venta de frutas variadas, las cuales compra en la capital y en otras ocasiones le envía un proveedor, para llevarlos a vender por los caseríos y asentamientos humanos ubicados en los márgenes y conos de la ciudad, pare eso cuenta con un triciclo acondicionado con un amplificador.
Realiza ésta actividad desde hace más de 6 años, contando con el apoyo de su pareja quien vende desde su casa, de esa manera logran acabar todos sus productos y dar mayor rotación a su capital.
Le gusta su actividad ya que lo mantiene ocupado, decidiéndose por ésta actividad por la necesidad de tener un oficio para contar con un ingreso económico para solventar los gastos del su hogar y la educación de sus hijos, además de poder manejar su propio horario de trabajo. Por lo contrario le incomoda cuando en una jornada vende lo suficiente para cubrir los gastos de su casa, muchas veces debido a las lluvias constantes, pero eso no lo desanima y continua trabajando, teniendo planes de seguir en su negocio. Este será el  préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por tanto se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de frutas a precio por mayor, traídos desde la capital, de diversas variedades para surtir su negocio, buscando precios comodos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Benito is 31 and is a man with a lot of experience in business.  He is also happy and friendly.  He is in a common-law marriage with Elsa, who is a merchant and the mother of their 2 children:  Jorge, 2, and Sayaza, 6 months.  He lives with Elsa and their children, whom he loves very much, in their own home.  They are his motivation.  Benito sells various fruits, which he buys in the capital.  Sometimes a supplier sends them to him.  He takes them to sell to towns and settlements located on the edges of the city.  For this, he has a tricycle equipped with an amplifier.  He has done this work for more than 6 months and has the help of Elsa, who sells from their home.  In this way, they are able to sell all of their products and have better turnover of their inventory.

He likes his work because it keeps him busy.  He decided to do it because he needed a business that would let him have an economic income to pay for his home's expenses and his children's education and that would let him manage his own work schedule.  On the other hand, it bothers him when he doesn't sell enough to cover his home's expenses, which happens sometimes due to the constant rains.  But this doesn't discourage him, and he keeps working.  He has plans to continue with his business.  This will be his second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma.  He hopes that through it, he can continue with his goals.  He promises to make his payments on time like he did with his previous loan.  With the requested amount of 1,500 PEN, he will invest in the wholesale purchase of a variety of fruits that he will get in the capital to stock his business.  He will look for good prices for his high-volume purchases.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruits wholesale.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
La señora Leonor tiene ya mas de cinco años dedicándose a la venta de ropa y zapatos usados para toda la familia.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertir en compra de mercancía que es ropa de verano y zapatos, porque sus clientes le están solicitando que tenga este tipo de mercancía, y por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para invertir en el negocio, sin descapitalizarlo. Ya que es la fuente de ingreso para sus tres hijos que tiene bajo su responsabilidad, a los cuales quiere darle lo mejor y lo necesario para un mejor futuro.
Daña Leonor desea invertir en su negocio para tener mas ganancias y que sus clientes este satisfechos y le sigan comprando.
texts.en: Leonor has made a living for more than five years selling clothing and shoes for the whole family.  She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise, which is summer clothing and shoes.  Her customers are requesting this kind of merchandise, and she doesn't have the necessary money right now to invest in her business without losing capital in it.  It is the source of income for her three children, who are her responsibility.  She wants to give them the best and what they need for a better future.  Leonor hopes to invest in her business to have more profits so her customers are satisfied and keep buying from her.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Progresistas Group

texts.es:
Las Progresistas son un grupo solidario del municipio de García, Nuevo León. Ellas están solicitando su segundo crédito con esta institución para continuar invirtiéndolo en sus negocios. Las Progresistas son un grupo pequeño de 6 personas que se conocen muy bien entre ellas. Todas viven a pocas cuadras en la misma colonia y mencionan que no quieren dejar este crédito porque es muy bueno y les gusta.

Maricela Flores es una de las mujeres del grupo. Ella es casada y tiene 38 años. Tiene 2 hijos, la mayor es una es una niña de 12 años que estudia en la secundaria y el menor es un niño de apenas 4 años y que acaba de ingresar al kínder. Hace aproximadamente 2 años, Maricela decidió comenzar a vender entre sus amigas y vecinas productos naturales para adelgazar. Ella menciona que le ha ido muy bien porque estos son productos se venden durante todo el año, ya que siempre hay gente que está a dieta para estar bien de salud. Ahorita, le están ofreciendo productos naturales con un muy buen descuento por lo que quiere aprovechar el crédito para adquirirlos y poder sacarle una mayor ganancia a sus ventas. Maricela espera seguir incrementando sus ventas y aspira a algún día poner un club de nutrición. A largo plazo aspira ser representante de dichos productos, ya que así podría ganar más dinero desde la comodidad de su casa.
texts.en: Las Progresistas is a unified group from the municipality of García, Nuevo León. They are requesting their second loan with this institution so they can continue investing in their businesses. They are a small group of six women who know each other very well, since they all live very close to each other in the same neighborhood. They add that they are looking forward to this loan because it helps them and they enjoy it. Maricela is one of the women in the group. She is married and is 38 years old. She has two children, a 12-year-old daughter who is in school and a 4-year-old son who is about to start kindergarten. About two years ago, Maricela decided to start selling natural weight-loss products to her friends and neighbors. She says that it is going very well because she can sell these products throughout the year since there are always people who are on a diet to improve their health. Right now she is offering these products at a very good discount, which is why she wants to take advantage of the loan to acquire more products and be able to increase her profits. Maricela hopes to continue growing her sales and hopes to one day set up a nutrition club. In the long term, she hopes to be a product representative, since she can make more money from the comfort of her home.

loans.use: to purchase natural weight-loss products.

loans.name: Paxboch Group

texts.es:
La señora Santos Margarita es casada, tiene 52  años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educacion primaria, tiene 6 hijos los cuales no estudian, se dedica a la crianza de animales domésticos, inicio este negocio con la crianza de pollitas ponedoras y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es aserrador de madera.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de cerdos para la crianza , , ya que espera contar con una pequeña granja. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la crianza de animales y a la panadería.
texts.en:
Ms. Santos Margarita is married and 52 years old. She finished three years of primary school and has six children, none of whom are in school. She raises domestic animals. She started in this business raising laying hens, and to date she has ten years of experience. She counts on the support of her husband, who is a wood cutter.

She organized a group to request a loan that she will use to buy pigs to raise. She hopes that she can build a small farm. The rest of the group members raise animals or bake.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia de 55 años de edad, es una mujer empeñosa y trabajadora, además de alegre y sociable. Es conviviente con Pedro quien se dedica al comercio y es padre de sus 6 hijos. Vive en compañía de 2 de sus hijos: Percy de 29 años con su esposa y sus 2 hijos; y Pedro de 25 años, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. Julia  tiene un negocio familiar que realiza con su pareja, siendo ella la administradora del negocio, que es la venta de pescados al por mayor. También cuenta con 2 mototaxi que compró con sus ganancias y los alquila a sus vecinos, negocio que empezo hace más de 5 años y esto es gracias a su pareja quien la apoyo a tomar esta decisión. Ahora él se encarga de congelar los productos para llevarlos a los mercados alejados. Considera su negocio rentable, más que su anterior trabajo que fue la venta de verduras. Le gusta su actividad por el ingreso económico, ya que le ayuda a solventar sus gastos del hogar. En un futuro desea abrir una bodega de abarrotes en su casa, para que pueda estar más de cerca de los suyos. Este será el  préstamo número 7 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de su mercadería que es le pescado fresco. Asimismo le dará mantenimiento a su mototaxi y puedan seguir trabajando.
texts.en: Julia is a 55-year-old, hard-working woman who is also happy and sociable. She is married to Pedro, with whom she has six children. She lives with two of her kids: Percy, 29, and his wife and two children; and Pedro, 25. Together, they all live comfortably in her home. Julia and her husband have a family business selling fish at wholesale, and she does the administrating. She also has two mototaxis that she purchased with her profits and rents to her neighbors. She started the business more than five years ago, thanks to her husband's support. Now, he is in charge of freezing the fish to take to the distant markets. Julia considers her businesses to be lucrative, more so than her previous job selling vegetables. She enjoys the activity because of the income, which helps her family cover household expenses. In the future she wants to open a small grocery store in her home so she can be closer to her loved ones. This will be her seventh loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she hopes it will help fulfill her objectives. With the money she is requesting, she plans to purchase fresh fish and perform maintenance on her mototaxis so they can keep running.

loans.use: to purchase more fish and maintain her vehicles.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma y siempre tener una gran empatía con los niños, y fue por esta razón que decidió montar su negocio donde cuida y ofrece educación y alimentación a los niños que por los oficios de sus madres requieren de una madre sustituta durante gran parte del día. Maria tiene el reconocimiento de la entidad del estado que brinda por el cuidado y protección de los niños y gracias a esto ha tenido un gran reconocimiento. Su hogar infantil lo tiene ubicado en su casa donde tiene dos grandes salones para cuidar los niños. Debido a que la entidad estatal que le ha dado el aval para realizar la actividad, le ha exigido realizar algunas mejoras locativas, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar mejoras locativas en su hogar infantil para seguir teniendo el aval de la entidad del estado que le permite realizar su actividad.

Maria espera que de esta manera siga operando su hogar infantil y pueda seguir cuidando los niños que por los oficios de sus madres requieren de una persona que les brinde la atención durante gran parte del día. Además, Maria espera que de esta manera siga teniendo un reconocimiento entre las personas de su sector y esto le haga tener mayores clientes para su negocio. Maria sueña con tener un gran jardín infantil con un mayor número de niños y poder seguir trabajando con la niñez que siempre ha querido.
texts.en:
María has always been known as a person who has great charisma and a lot of empathy for children.  This was why she decided to set up her own business where she takes care of children and offers them education and nourishment when their mothers require a substitute mother during a big part of the day.  María is recognized by the government institution that provides for the care and protection of children, and thanks to this she has had recognition.

Her home child care center is located in her house, where she has two large rooms to take care of the children.

Because the government institution that gives her the backing to do her job has required her to make some improvements, María is looking that a loan will give her the opportunity to make improvements to her home child care center to continue having the backing.

María hopes that in this way she will continue running her child care center and be able to continue caring for the children who need to be with a person who takes care of them for a large part of the day because of their mothers' jobs.  In addition, María hopes that she will continue being recognized among the people of her area so she will have more customers for her business.

María dreams about having a large kindergarten with a greater number of children and being able to continue working with childhood as she always has wanted.

loans.use: to make improvements on her home child care center to continue having the support of the government institution that allows her to do her job.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Maribel le esta haciendo falta la losa al frente de la casa y la elaboración de barda trasera. Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar el material, que es arena, cemento, varilla, block y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora a su casa. 
Doña Maribel trabaja en la vecina ciudad de Laredo Texas y su esposo es empleado de una agencia, en el aria de contabilidad. Son las fuentes de ingresos que tiene para darles lo mejor a sus dos hijos pequeños que tiene y que su patrimonio este en buenas condiciones y que sea seguro para ellos. 
La señora Maribel ya ha tenido un crédito con KIVA el cual fue para mejorar su vivienda, es pera contar con su cooperación para este crédito.
texts.en:
Maribel's home is missing a concrete slab at the front of the house and a rear wall. She is requesting a loan to buy materials (sand, cement, rods, and concrete blocks) and to pay the person who will make these improvements to her house.

Maribel works in the neighboring city of Laredo, Texas, and her husband is employed by an agency where he works in accounting. These are the sources of income they have for providing their two small children with the best and for ensuring that their legacy is safe and in good condition for them.

Maribel has had a loan with Kiva before, which was also for home improvements. She hopes she can count on your cooperation with this loan.

loans.use: to add a concrete slab in front of her house and a wall in back

loans.name: Kenny

texts.es:
Kenny, de 24 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y con muchos deseos de superación, así como alegre y amable. Es soltero y sin hijos, vive en compañía de su padre, su madre y sus 03 hermanos Deysi de 29 años, Yen de 22 años y Aron de 19 años de edad, habitando cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Kenny es la transporte de pasajeros para lo cual cuenta con un automóvil usado que compró con sus ahorros en una oportunidad que se presento a bajo costo  hace 2 años. Para realizar su trabajo  se levanta muy de temprano para buscar sus pasajeros por las calles de la ciudad realizando su jornada hasta el medio día, hora en que regresa a descansar, y en las tardes se dedica a sus estudios técnicos.
Considera a su actividad rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja.
Le gusta su actividad ya que puede manejar sus tiempos libres y dedicarse a los estudios, y comenta se decidió por ésta actividad por la necesidad de tener los ingresos económicos ya que tenia muchas necesidades y gastos que no podía solventar, ahora se siente más tranquilo y cómodo ya que tiene un ingreso permanente y cuenta con más tiempo libre. Por lo contrario comenta que le incomoda un poco cuando llueve muy seguido ya que esto dificulta su trabajo, pero eso no lo desanima y continúa trabajando. Por tanto tiene planes de terminar sus estudios superiores y crear su propia empresa de transportes. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP.  Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por tanto, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores y tener  un buen record crediticio. Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles, tiene planes de invertir en mantenimiento de su automóvil y en la compra de repuestos como llantas y otros, para así tener operativo su herramienta de trabajo.
texts.en: Kenny is a hard-working 24-year-old with a strong desire to move up in life. He is also happy and friendly. He is single, doesn't have any children and lives comfortably with his parents and his three siblings: Deysi, 29; Yen, 22; and Aron, 19. Kenny makes a living transporting passengers with an automobile he purchased with his savings when a low-cost opportunity presented itself two years ago. He gets up very early in search of customers on the city streets, works until he takes a mid-day break, and then dedicates himself to technical school in the afternoon. He considers his work lucrative because of the good profits he makes. He enjoys the activity because he can manage his free time and focus on his studies. He says that he decided on this work out of the need to earn income because he had a lot of needs that he couldn't afford. Now he feels more calm and comfortable because he has steady income and more free time. However, he tells us that it bothers him a bit when it rains a lot because it makes it difficult to work, but it doesn't discourage him. He plans to finish his higher education and start his own transportation company. This will be his second loan with Kiva partner MFP, and he hopes your collaboration will help solidify his plans. He promises to make his payments on time like he did with his previous loan, and he has a good credit history. With the money he is requesting, he plans to invest in the maintenance of his automobile and to purchase spare parts like tires and other items, so he can keep his vehicle in good shape.

loans.use: to perform vehicle maintenance and purchase tires.

loans.name: Noua Marcelline

texts.fr: Noua Marcelline est mariée, âgée de 29 ans et mère d'un enfant. Elle commercialise des ustensiles, des produits corporels et des bijoux. En vue d'achalander son stock et d'avoir un grand nombre de profit elle a sollicité un financement auprès de Finadev afin que les marges bénéficiaires puissent lui permettre de supporter les charges de son enfants.
texts.en:
Noua Marcelline is 29 years old, married, and the mother of one child.  

She sells utensils, body products and some jewelry.  In order to increase her stock of goods and her profits, she has requested a loan from Finadev.  She hopes that the profit margins will enable her to take care of her child's needs.

loans.use: to buy one set of plates, one set of iceboxes and one dozen body products.

loans.name: Paula Andrea Ramirez

texts.es:
Sin un gran capital Paula inició su negocio de salón de belleza y servicios de cosmetología, con el cual ha venido generando los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento y el sostenimiento de su hijo. Paula en un principio abrió su negocio ofreciendo solamente el servicio de corte y cepillado del cabello, pero comenzó a estudiar cosmetología y posteriormente logró adquirir equipos de masajes y así fue aumentando la oferta de servicios que ofrece a sus clientes. Gracias a esto, ha podido captar un gran número de clientes y su negocio es muy reconocido por el buen servicio que ofrece. Paula, con este negocio, le ha permitido a su hijo de 2 años tener una buena calidad de vida sin importar que su padre los haya abandonado desde hace un tiempo, y es por esto que Paula quiere seguir aumentando las ventas de su negocio y ofrecer mejor calidad de vida en su hogar. Para la compra de un nuevo equipo de masajes, Paula busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un equipo de ultracavitación con el cual pueda ofrecer un mejor servicio de masajes a sus clientes.

Paula espera que de esta manera sus clientes aumenten de manera considerable, pues ya podrá ofrecer un servicio completo con el cual sus clientes quedarán más satisfechos y tendrán como referencia su negocio. Además, Paula espera con mayores ingresos ofrecer a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y ofrecerle mayores oportunidades económicas para su progreso. Paula sueña con tener un gran centro de estética, ubicada en un local propio y en el cual pueda ofrecer más empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Without a lot of capital, Paula started her beauty salon and cosmetology service business, with which she has been generating the necessary income to support herself and her child.  Paula opened her business offering only cutting and brushing hair, but she began to study cosmetology and later managed to acquire massage equipment, and so she expanded the services she offered to her customers.  Thanks to this she has been able to attract a large number of customers and her business is very well known for her good customer service.  

With this business, Paula has given her two-year-old son a good quality of life despite the fact that his father had abandoned them a long time ago.  This is why Paula wants to continue increasing her sales and offering a better quality of life in her home.

For the purchase of new massage equipment, Paula is looking that a loan gives her the possibility to buy an ultracavitation machine with which she can give better massage service to her customers.

Paula hopes that in this way her clientele will increase considerably because she will be able to offer complete service with which her customers will be more satisfied and will refer her business. 

In addition, Paula hopes that, with the greater income, she can offer her son a better quality of life and better economic opportunities for his progress.  Paula dreams about having a big beauty center, located in her own place and where she can offer more employment for the neediest people.

loans.use: to buy an ultracavitation machine to give better massage service to her customers.

loans.name: Guadalupe Castellanos Perdomo

texts.es:
El señor Guadalupe, tiene 62 años de edad, casado, vive en una aldea de Santa Cruz de Yojoa junto a su hija menor de 10 años de edad, sus otros hijos son mayores de edad y están independizados.

Don Guadalupe tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura, hace dos años comenzó con el cultivo de fruta  como ser Lichas (nombre científico rambután)  y  hortalizas como el  cilantro. Anteriormente se ha dedicado al cultivo del pataste. Se motivo por este cultivo por la alta demanda que hay en el mercado. Tiene un área de terreno de una manzana cultivada de esta fruta y parcelas de cilantro, le dedica 5 horas diarias para darle mantenimiento.
Desde el año 2001 empezó a solicitar préstamos a ODEF, lleva 34 ciclos de préstamos, el actual es por 15,000.00 Lempiras y los va invertir en compra de fertilizantes para darle un buen mantenimiento y lograr buenas cosechas del cultivo de  fruta y cilantro. 
Su meta es seguir trabajando con este cultivo, mejorar la producción y sus ingresos para su solvencia económica.
texts.en: Guadalupe is 62 years old, married, and lives in a village of Santa Cruz de Yojoa together with his youngest daughter who is 10 years old. His other children are adults and independent. Guadalupe has made a living in agriculture for many years. Two years ago he started planting fruit like lychee (rambutan) and garden produce like cilantro. Previously, he had made his living planting pataste [a long green vegetable, similar to zucchini]. He was motivated to plant this crop due to the high market demand. He has a plot of land of one manzana [about 1.72 acres] planted with this fruit and plots of cilantro and spends five hours a day maintaining it In 2001 he began requesting loans from ODEF and he has had 34 loans. His current loan is for 15,000 Lempiras and he will use it to buy fertilizers to well maintain his crops and produce a good harvest from the crops of fruit and cilantro. Hi goal is to continue working with this crop and to improve his production and his income so as to be financially solvent.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to maintain his fruit crop (lychees or rambutans, and cilantro).

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Patricia le esta haciendo falta los acabados del exterior. Solicita el préstamo para comprar el material que es cemento, arena, pintura especia para el exterior y que pueda proteger su casa de los del clima como es de las lluvias. 
Doña Patricia es viuda y actualmente vive sola, pero cuenta con la ayuda económica de sus hijos, a un así la señora Patricia esta trabajando en una casa partículas, haciendo la limpieza. 
Desea mejorar su patrimonio y que este en mejores condiciones y proteger se de enfermedades.
texts.en:
Patricia's home is lacking the finishing touches to its exterior. She is requesting a loan to buy materials like cement, sand, and special paint for the exterior that will be able to protect her home from the weather such as the rains. 

Patricia is a widow and she currently lives alone, though she does have the financial support of her children. Despite this, Patricia is working cleaning in private homes.

She wants to improve her estate and hopes to be in a better condition while protecting herself from disease.

loans.use: to do the finishing touches to the exterior of her home.

loans.name: Duo Asunción Group

texts.es:
DUO ASUNCION.
Doña Irma ella se dedica a la venta de suéteres en el mercado municipal de la localidad los días de mercado y también se dedica a la crianza de pollos en su casa, ella solicita este crédito para poder ampliar  mas su negocio y la compra de sueteres y espera que se le pueda apoyar ya que ella trabaja para el beneficio de su familia,el siguiente socio se dedica a la misma actividad.
texts.en:
Duo Asuncion

Irma makes a living selling sweaters in the municipal market of her town on market days. She also raises chickens. She is requesting this loan to be able to expand her business and purchase sweaters. She hopes that she will receive support as she works for the benefit of her family. 

The other member of the group makes a living in the same business.

loans.use: to expand her business and buy sweaters for resale.

loans.name: Nathalie Rachelle

texts.fr:
Nathalie est une jeune femme agée de 29 ans, mariée mère de 5 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 17 ans et 6 mois, quatre de ses enfants vont déjà à l'école. Le premier qui as 17 ans n'est pas d'elle mais de son époux. Elle a un petit secrétariat, sa clientèle devient de plus en plus nombreuse alors elle sollicite un crédit pour agrandir sa structure en ajoutant les ordinateurs et le matériel bureautique pour pouvoir la satisfaire et augmenter sa production.

Les bénéfices tirés de ce prêt lui permettront non seulement d'ajouter le petit matériel bureautique, mais aussi d'aider son époux dans les dépenses quotidiennes et surtout une partie de la scolarisation de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Nathalie is a young woman of 29 years. She is married and the mother of five children whose ages range from 17 years to 6 months. Four of her children already attend school.

She has a small secretarial business. Her clientele is growing so she is requesting a loan to expand her business by adding computers and office equipment. This will allow her to meet the needs of her customers and expand her services.

The profits from this loan will not only enable her to add small office equipment but will also help Nathalie assist her husband with daily expenses and especially with some of the school fees for their children.

loans.use: to purchase computers and office equipment.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham is a 38-year-old divorced woman. She is supporting her children, who live with her in her parents’ house.

To be able to support her family, Siham has been doing a small retail business selling blankets, toys and make-up products. 

She now wants to increase her capital by having a larger quantity of the products to be able to provide her children with good education and good life conditions, and for that has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to increase her capital by having a larger quantity of toys, blankets, and other consumer goods

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
Herminia, age 51, married and with three children, still wants to alleviate her family out of poverty. The family lives at Ugac Sur. Herminia operates a small store in front of their house to generate an income. She had been doing it for over three years now. Her spouse is a construction worker. Her three children are attending school and in need of daily allowances. She is thankful for the income from her business.

She is now asking for a loan of P8,000 to buy milk, coffee, eggs and soft drinks to sell in her store. In the future, she would like to have a good income from her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy milk, coffee, eggs and soft drinks to sell in her store.

loans.name: Novalyn Dalicun

texts.en:
Novalyn is a small entrepreneur selling snacks to the people in her village. She is selling siomai (meatballs made of shrimp or pork, wrapped and usually steamed). She buys ingredients at the public market to cook and sell in the afternoon. She usually generates P2,000 each month and it goes for daily meals for the family.

She would like to improve her sales, so she is asking for an additional capital of P8,000 to buy wrappers, cooking oil and ingredients used in cooking siomai to sell. In the future, though she generates only minimal income, she is hoping to increase it to save funds to use when emergency arises.

loans.use: to buy wrappers, cooking oil and ingredients used in cooking siomai to sell.

loans.name: Donata Ballad

texts.en:
Donata is a retail store owner at Ugac Sur. She lives with her spouse, who is a carpenter. They have three children. She has been in her business for almost eight years. 

She wanted to increase her product offerings, so she is now asking for a loan of P8,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, eggs and shampoo to sell. In the future, she aims for business expansion to gain consistent profits from her small business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, eggs and shampoo to sell.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria and her spouse live simply at Ugac Sur with their only child. Francisco, her spouse, provides motorcycle transport services to the people in their village. They usually earn about P3,000 each month and the income goes for meals and bills at home. 

She is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy gasoline and tires for the motorcycle. This will help operate the business continuously and earn more income from it. She supports her spouse very well and she knows they will achieve financial stability someday.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and tires for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is 43 years old, married, and has two children attending school. She is managing a small store in the village where they live. She started her business six years ago and earns about P4,000 each month.

She would like to increase her sales, so she is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy cooking oil, bottles of vinegar, biscuits, and sardines to sell in her store. She will be very happy if this loan will be granted to her as a way of a business improvement. She hopes to earn good profits from her business.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, bottles of vinegar, biscuits, and sardines to sell in her store.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a supportive mother and wife to her husband. Her husband Roger provides motorcycle transport services to the people in their village. They usually earn about a minimum of P350 daily and it goes for meals and allowances for the children. She hopes to keep ensuring safe travel for their passengers, so she would like a loan to maintain their business.
 
She is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy tires, mirrors and gasoline for the motorcycle. In the future, she hopes to achieve a good daily profit from the business.

loans.use: to buy tires, mirrors and gasoline for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en: Susana is engaged in a hog-raising business that primarily involves hogs for breeding. It is a business she started several years ago. Now, she needs to increase her business, and this is why she is taking out a loan of 10,000 PHP that she will use to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise. This business helps Susana, because it's the only source of income she has to raise her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: Hog-raising is the chosen business of Rowena, a 38 year old who is married and has four children. She lives with her family in the village of San Roque. She has been engaged in her business for over eight years. Right now she is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase feed and vaccine for the proper growth of her hog-raising business. She believes that her sacrifices will lead her to reach her goal, which is to increase her profit and save some for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vaccine for the proper growth of her hog-raising business.

loans.name: Shameem's Group

texts.en:
Shameem has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s animal skin sales business. Her husband buys the animal skins from butchers and sells them to different factories who use them to make different products. With the loan investment, he will buy a larger quantity of animal skins for reselling and earn more profits. 

Shameem herself is a seamstress, sewing clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very creative in her work and can prepare clothes according to the latest trend and fashion. She is the mother of a son and a daughter. Her son is studying while her daughter remains at home and helps her in her routine tasks. She is very hopeful that by investing the loan into her husband’s business, her husband will be able to expand it further and it will help Shameem and her family to live better financial life. 

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Shameem.

loans.use: To buy animal skins for selling.

loans.name: Fiyaz Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Fiyaz bibi has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her son’s fruit selling business. He is a very hardworking and honest person by nature.
